wikidiscover-desc: Allows [[Special:WikiDiscover|discovering wikis]] on a wiki farm with [[Special:CreateWiki|CreateWiki]].
apihelp-wikidiscover-summary: Get a list of wikis on a CreateWiki wikifarm.
apihelp-wikidiscover-param-state: Filter by the CreateWiki defined state of a wiki.
apihelp-wikidiscover-param-siteprop: Information to return about a defined wiki.
apihelp-wikidiscover-param-limit: Maximum number of results to show.
apihelp-wikidiscover-example: Show all wikis on the form.
